trans-unit.source: Specifies attributes of print queues.
trans-unit.target: 指定打印队列的特性。

trans-unit.source: Use these values with the <xref:System.Printing.PrintServer.GetPrintQueues%2A> method to list subsets of available print queues.
trans-unit.target: 将这些值用于<xref:System.Printing.PrintServer.GetPrintQueues%2A>于可用的打印队列的子集，列表的方法。

trans-unit.source: PushedMachineConnection and PushedUserConnection refer to policies that enable automated connection of machines and users to printers.
trans-unit.target: PushedMachineConnection 和 PushedUserConnection 指启用自动的连接的计算机和打印机的用户的策略。

trans-unit.source: See the section "Deploying Printers to Users or Computers by Using Group Policy" in the [Step-by-Step Guide for Print Management](http://technet2.microsoft.com/WindowsServer/en/Library/312b10cb-73ec-40c7-a4df-63dd7248d93d1033.mspx).
trans-unit.target: 参阅中的"部署打印机到用户或计算机通过使用组策略"部分[进行打印管理的分步指南](http://technet2.microsoft.com/WindowsServer/en/Library/312b10cb-73ec-40c7-a4df-63dd7248d93d1033.mspx)。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Printing.EnumeratedPrintQueueTypes.PushedMachineConnection> enumeration to get a subset of available print queues.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Printing.EnumeratedPrintQueueTypes.PushedMachineConnection>枚举，以获取可用的打印队列的子集。

trans-unit.source: A print queue that is connected to the specified print server.
trans-unit.target: 连接到指定打印服务器的打印队列。

trans-unit.source: A print queue that sends a print job directly to printing instead of spooling the job first.
trans-unit.target: 直接将打印作业发送到打印，而不是先发送到后台打印作业的打印队列。

trans-unit.source: A print queue for a printer that has bidirectional communication enabled.
trans-unit.target: 已启用双向通信的打印机的打印队列。

trans-unit.source: A print queue that holds its print jobs when the document and printer configurations do not match.
trans-unit.target: 当文档和打印机配置不匹配时停止其打印作业的打印队列。

trans-unit.source: A print queue that services a fax machine.
trans-unit.target: 服务于传真机的打印队列。

trans-unit.source: A print queue that keeps jobs in the queue after printing them.
trans-unit.target: 打印完作业后将其保留在队列中的打印队列。

trans-unit.source: A print queue that is installed as a local print queue on the specified print server.
trans-unit.target: 作为本地打印队列安装在指定打印服务器上的打印队列。

trans-unit.source: A print queue that is visible in the directory of printers.
trans-unit.target: 打印机目录中可看见的打印队列。

trans-unit.source: A print queue that was installed by using the Push Printer Connections computer policy.
trans-unit.target: 使用“推入打印机连接”计算机策略安装的打印队列。

trans-unit.source: A print queue that was installed by using the Push Printer Connections user policy.
trans-unit.target: 使用“推入打印机连接”用户策略安装的打印队列。

trans-unit.source: A print queue that allows multiple print jobs in the queue.
trans-unit.target: 允许队列中存在多个打印作业的打印队列。

trans-unit.source: A print queue that spools only raw data.
trans-unit.target: 仅对原始数据进行后台处理的打印队列。

trans-unit.source: A print queue that is shared.
trans-unit.target: 共享的打印队列。

trans-unit.source: A print queue that is installed by the redirection feature in Terminal Services.
trans-unit.target: 通过“终端服务”中的重定向功能安装的打印队列。

trans-unit.source: A print queue that can work offline.
trans-unit.target: 可脱机工作的打印队列。
